评论详情: I wanted to love this top. It fit nicely and was an attractive color. The inside layer was soft enough to be comfortable. However, it was just too cheaply made. I found a couple of black marks on the inside layer, which I could have lived with. What I couldn’t live with is that it took literally a half an hour to remove the wrinkles — a half an hour where I was terrified that I would put a hole in the fabric. This was after washing, drying, and removing promptly from the dryer. I returned this garment because it is just too high maintenance.

This is a very pretty top,but the majority of reviews said it ran small and the inner shell or layer was skin type.  In fact I had a message saying a medium would fit me.  So I thought if it did run small I would be able to wear a medium size.  I tried the top on and I thought it might work.  The inner layer was definitely not skin tight,but that's okay.  I don't like tight fitting clothes.  I washed the top and next morning I ironed it.  I put it on and realized it truly was too big for me.  So, I'm going to give it too someone else who can wear a medium.  I'm 5 feet, maybe 51/5 and I weigh 98Lbs.  It's a pretty top, just a size too large and a little top long for me.
